Rayon Sports vs Police FC

Rayon Sports 0-1 Police FC

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Ngabo Roben

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

17:25

Umukino urarangiye

Ku munsi wa 11 gusa wa shampiyona Rayon Sports imaze gutsindwa imikino ine. Itatu muri iyo yatsindwagamo igitego iminota 90 yarangiye ku mukino wa Kiyovu Sports, APR FC na Police FC

17:22

90' IGITEGO CYA POLICE FC

Umupira uzamukanywe na Antoine Dominique Ndayishimiye aha Jean Paul Uwimbabazi acunga uko umunyezamu ahagaze imbere amwoherereza urutambi rw'ishoti afungura amazamu. Agahinda ku bakunzi ba Rayon Sports bayoboye umukino kuva ku isegonda rya mbere

17:17

86' Michael Sarpong yongeye kwinubirwa na bagenzi be

Rutahizamu ukomoka muri Ghana Michael Sarpong ufite ibitego byinshi muri Shampiyona y'u Rwanda ntabwo yahiriwe n'umukino w'uyu munsi. Ahawe umupira mwiza na Sefu ariko ananirwa gufunga umupira uramurengana

17:13

82' Ubushyamirane hagati y'abakinnyi ba Rayon Sports

Michael Sarpong yasabiye umupira ku ruhande rw'iburyo hafi y'umurongo wa koruneri asabwa na bagenzi be barimo Yannick Mukunzi na Gilbert bari imbere y'izamu ariko ahitamo gutera ishoti mu izamu birangira umupira ugiye hanze. Bitumye abakinnyi b'ikipe ye bamushinja kwikunda no kwiharira

17:07

76' Ndayisaba Hamidou utahiriwe atanze umwanya

Umukinnyi wo hagati wa Police FC Ndayisaba Hamidou bavanye muri AS Kigali ntabwo yigeze yigaragaza muri uyu mukino bitumye atanga umwanya kuri Antoine Dominique Ndayishimiye, na Isaie Songa asimburwa na Hakizimana Kevin Police FC yavanye muri MVS

17:05

72' Police FC idatsinzwe umukino yasigara isingiza umunyezamu wayo

Habonetse Coup franc ku ikosa Muvandimwe yakoreye Sefu, iterwa neza na Rutanga Eric, umupira awushyira mu nguni y'izamu ariko umunyezamu Nduwayo arirambura akozeho imitwe y'intoki umupira arawurenza

17:02

70' Nyuma yo guhusha ibitego bitatu byabazwe Manishimwe Djabel arasimbujwe

Umutoza Robertinho ahisemo guha umwanya Yannick Mukunzi asimbuza Manishimwe Djabel bivuga ko abakinnyi basigaye mu kibuga ku ruhande rwa Rayon Sports bakina basatira ari babiri gusa, Gilbert na Sarpong abandi bakina bugarira. Bitunguye benshi

17:00

68' Indi karita y'umuhondo kuri Police FC

Niyonzima Olivier Sefu azamukanye umupira ku ruhande rw'iburyo ariko Mitima Isaac amukorera ikosa rimuhesha ikarita y'umuhondo ariko coup franc yavuyemo ntacyo ibyaye

16:53

62' Gusimbuza ku mpande zombi

Umutoza Albert Mphande ukomoka muri Zambia akoze impinduka, Uwimbabazi Jean Paul afata umwanya wa Iyabivuze Osee umukinnyi usatira aciye iburyo utabonye imipira myinshi mu minota yakinnye. Naho Rayon Sports yinjije Mugisha Gilbert mu mwanya wa rutahizamu DaSilva

16:48

Imikino itanu iheruka kuri aya makipe

16:45

Rayon Sports irayoboye muri ba rutahizamu

16:44

52' Myugariro Hakizimana Issa ntabwo asanzwe

Kuko ikipe ya Rayon Sports ikomeje gusatira cyane ikipe ya Police FC ba myugariro ba Police FC bari gukora akazi katoroshye ariko cyane Hakizimana Issa bita Vidic, umukinnyi wavuye muri LLB y'i Burundi akomeje gutabara ikipe ye akura imipira kuri ba rutahizamu ba Rayon Sports mu buryo butangaje kandi butunguranye

16:38

47' Rutahizamu w'umunya-Brazil ahushije igitego ari mu izamu wenyine

Ntabwo bisanzwe. Rutanga Eric azamukanye umupira awuhindura imbere y'izamu awurenza umunyeza na ba myugariro ba Police FC umupira usanga DaSilva ku giti cy'izamu cya kabiri ariko ntiyawuhamya ku kirenge umupira ujya hejuru y'izamu

16:36

Igice cya kabiri gitangijwe na Police FC

Rutahizamu Isaie Songa atangije igice cya kabiri bahita bagerageza gusatira ariko Iyabivuze Osee atakaza umupira wahise ufatwa na ba myugariro ba Rayon Sports

16:34

Amafoto y'igice cya mbere

16:33

Abainnyi b'impande zombi bagarutse mu kibuga

Abakinnyi ba Police FC na Rayon Sports bagarutse mu kibuga aho bitegura gutangira igice cya kabiri

16:19

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

Ku isegonda rya nyuma ry'igice cya mbere Radu wagoye cyane Police FC ahinduye umupira usanga Donkor Prosper Kuka imbere y'izamu ariko umutwe ateye ntiyawuboneza mu izamu

16:17

Iminota ibiri y'inyongera ku gice cya mbere

Iminota 45 y'igice cya mbere irangiye Rayon Sports iri gusatira Police FC bikomeye ariko umunyezamu wayo Nduwayo akomeza kuyitabara. Umusifuzi yongeyeho iminota ibiri y'inyongera

16:15

42' Police FC iri kugaragaza urwego rwo hasi

Uruhande rw'ibumoso rwa Police FC ruriho Muvandimwe JMV rwazahajwe na Iradukunda Eric uri guhindura imipira myinshi. Ahinduye umupira usanga Manishimwe Djabel agerageza gutsinda igitego agaramye mu buryo bita Garincha ariko umupira uca hejuru y'izamu

16:12

39' Ba rutahizamu babiri ba Rayon Sports bahushije igitego bari ku izamu bonyine

Donkor Prosper Kuka yibye umugono abakina hagati muri Police FC acomekere umupira Michael Sarpong, we na mugenzi we DaSilva birukanse n'umuvuduko mwinshi asigarana n'umunyezamu wenyine ariko Nduwayo atabara izamu awukuramo uhura na Sefu asubizamo irindi shoti rikomeye uyu munyezamu yongera kuba ibamba. Police FC iri kotswa igitutu

16:06

36' Police FC yokeje igitutu izamu rya Rayon Sports

Iyabivuze Osee acomekeye umupira mwiza Isaie Songa ariko Bashunga Abouba atabara izamu rye

16:05

34' Ikarita y'umuhondo kuri Muvandimwe JMV

Muvandmwe JMV akoze amakosa atatu yikurikiranya bituma umusifuzi Ishimwe Claude amuha ikarita y'umuhondo nyuma yo gukorera ikosa Iradukunda Radu

16:04

Umukino ubaye uhagaze

Manzi Thierry akorewe ikosa na Muvandimwe JMV, ubu ari kwitabwaho n'abaganga

16:00

29' Ishoti rikomeye ritewe na Manishimwe Djabel ntacyo ribyaye

Niyonzima Olivier Sefu agonganye na Peter Otema ariko Sefu amutanga ku mupira awuha mugenzi we Manishimwe Djabel agerageza gutungura umunyezamu Nduwayo Bariteze Aimee ariko umupira uca hejuru y'izamu

15:56

24' Manishimwe Djabel ahushije uburyo ashobora kwicuza

Michael Sarpong n'umuvuduko mwinshi yirukankanye umupira ku ruhande rw'ibumoso aha Manishimwe Djabel wari mu rubuga rw'amahina wenyine atera hejuru y'izamu kubera igihunga

15:54

22' Peter Otema ni uwo kwitonderwa na ba myugariro ba Rayon Sports

Uyu rutahizamu usatira aciye ku ruhande rw'ibumoso acenze Iradukunda Radu ahindura umupira ufatwa na Mushimiyimana atazuyaje awuha Muvandimwe JMV ariko atera hejuru y'izamu

15:50

19' Police FC igeze ku izamu rya Rayon Sports ku nshuro ya mbere

Umupira uzamukanywe neza na Peter Otema acomekera Songa Isaie ariko ahita agongana na Iradukunda Eric Radu bivamo Coup franc yatewe na Mohamed Mushimiyimana ariko umupira kubita mu rukuta ugaruka mu kibuga hagati

15:47

14' Ikarita y'umuhondo ya mbere ku ruhande rwa Police FC

Abakinnyi ba Police FC bakomeje gukora amakosa. Peter Otema asunitse Niyonzima Olivier Sefu mu maso y'umusifuzi wo ku ruhande Bwiriza Nonat bimuviramo ikarita y'umuhondo ariko coup franc itewe na Manishimwe Djabel yo ijya hejuru y'izamu

15:38

06' Police FC itangiranye amakosa mu bwugarizi

Rayon Sports ibonye coup franc ku ikosa rikorewe Iradukunda Eric rikozwe na Muvandimwe JMV

15:37

Rwatubyaye, Rutanga na bagenzi babo bariteguye

15:35

Police FC nitsinda, irahita ijya imbere ya Rayon Sports ku rutonde rwa shampiyona

15:33

Peter Otema yiteguye guhangana n'ikipe yahozemo

15:31

Umukino uratangiye

Ikipe ya Rayon Sports niyo itangije umupira utangijwe na rutahizamu Michael Sarpong

15:29

Abakinnyi 11 bagiye kubanza mu kibuga ku mpande zombi



Rayon Sports: Bashunga Abouba, Iradukunda Eric, Rutanga Eric, Rwatubyaye Abdul, Manzi Thierry (C), Niyonzima Olivier Sefu, Mutsinzi Ange Jimmy, Donkor Prosper Kuka, Manishimwe Djabel, Michael Sarpong, na Jonathan Raphael DaSilva


Police FC: Bariteze Aimee, Mpozembizi Mohamed, Hakizimana Issa, Mitima Isaac, Muvandimwe JMV, Ngendahimana Eric (C), Mushimiyimana Mohamed, Ndayisaba Hamidou, Iyabivuze Osee, Peter Otema na Songa Isaie.

15:26

Abakinnyi ba Rayon Sports bageze ku kibuga ahagana saa munani

15:24

Twageze i Nyamirambo

I Nyamirambo hagiye kubera umukino wâ€™umunsi wa 11 wa shampiyona uhuza Rayon Sports na Police FC kuri Stade ya Kigali irimo abafana bake cyane.

Police FC ya Albert Mphane yishimiye gukina uyu mukino ifite Hakizimana Issa bita Vidic ku nshuro ya mbere, myugariro bavanye muri LLB yâ€™i Burundi.

Ni ihangana rikomeye ku mpande zombi. Police FC nishobora gutsinda uyu mukino irahita ica kuri Rayon Sports kuko iyirusha amanota abiri gusa ku rutonde rwâ€™agateganyo rwa shampiyona yâ€™u Rwanda.

Ni umukino ugiye kuyoborwa nâ€™umusifuzi mpuzamahanga Ishimwe Claude.
